sentences.sContent: Was he motivated solely by a desire for power?
sentences.sCn: 他只是受到权欲的驱使吗？

sentences.sContent: ...and motivate us to make the purchase even more...
...the same motivation that can push people to exert more effort in a constructive way could also motivate people to be more likely to engage in unethical behaviors...
...where managers used financial incentives to motivate salesmen to meet specific revenue goals...
...“Goal-setting does help coordinate and motivate people...

synos.tran: 刺激；使有动机；激发…的积极性

words.tran: 动机的；激发性的；有关动机的；动机说明
动作；移动；手势；请求；意向
主题；动机；主旨；图形；意念
使产生动机；激发…的积极性（motivate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 作为…的动机； 激励， 激发
trans.tranOther: to be the reason why someone does something
